name: Midare Ranzan: Cryo
description:
When the attached character uses a Plunging Attack: Physical DMG dealt becomes Cryo DMG, and deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a skill: This effect is removed.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character uses a $[K52]: </color>$[K100] dealt becomes $[K101], and deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a skill:</color> This effect is removed.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Plunging Attack</color>: </color>{SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt becomes {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, and deals +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a skill:</color> This effect is removed.
